snippet: A man convicted of stabbing to death four nieces and nephews in 1990 was executed Tuesday, despite pleas from his two sisters to spare the brother who killed their children.
abstract: Henry Jackson Jr, who was convicted of stabbing to death four nieces and nephews in 1990, is executed in Mississippi, despite pleas from his two sisters to spare him.
lead_paragraph: A man convicted of stabbing to death four nieces and nephews in 1990 was executed Tuesday, despite pleas from his two sisters to spare the brother who killed their children.

headline.main: Mississippi: Killer Executed After Plea Is Rejected
headline.print_headline: Mississippi: Killer Executed After Plea Is Rejected
